name: Whatever It takes (BurnerReborn)
description:
Go deeper and deeper into the abyss to find your dead wife in the after life. What you find may shock you. Be careful what you wish for.

Welcome to our Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam Entry! Whatever it takes is a 2d platformer that uses layer transitioning to go deeper and deeper in the abyss! You manipulate layer transitions to go deeper into the cave and save your wife!

Game Designer: Lance Jones aka Burner Reborn

Artist: Knightsofsummer

Programmer: Mohammed Alzakariya

Composer: Jose Rubens Kassai @zkassai

Audio Designer: Flilipe Campos

Technical Audio Designer: Lucas Emidio
